sense.def:
To shoot
pomeni pritisniti na sprožilec pri puški ali pištoli, da iz nje odleti naboj.

seg.quote: We were told to shoot first and ask questions later.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REFL VB

sense.def:
To shoot a person or animal
pomeni ubiti ali poškodovati človeka ali žival s strelom iz puške ali pištole.

seg.quote: He shot his wife and then shot himself.

sense.def:
To shoot an arrow
pomeni z lokom izstreliti puščico.

To shoot in a particular direction
pomeni premakniti se v določeno smer hitro in nenadoma.

seg.quote: She shot back into the room.
He shot out his hand and stopped the child from falling.

sense.def:
To shoot a glance at someone
pomeni nekoga hitro in za kratek čas pogledati;

seg.quote: He shot a suspicious glare at me.

sense.def:
Kadar film
is shot
, s filmsko kamero naredijo posnetke zanj.

seg.quote: Most of the film was shot in Spain.

sense.def:
A shoot
je rastlina, ki začenja rasti, ali nov del, ki raste iz drevesa ali druge rastline.

seg.quote: A few tender shoots had started to appear.

sense.def:
To shoot down an aeroplane or helicopter
pomeni streljati na letalo ali helikopter in ga zadeti, tako da se zruši.

Kadar nekaj
shoots up
, hitro zraste ali se poveča.

seg.quote: The inflation rate shot up from 30% to 48%.
